text: Went there for dinner. It is very near to sea water. It was windy that day, no rain so atmosphere was good so we sat outside. There are few tables with Aircon inside. The outside sitting chair were uncomfortable though. Quite high and cramped also when Toddler sits they can reach table height, they don't hav booster seat as well. Food was good though, order from the app directly. I would say it was at pricy side. Lot of options to choose from. The plaza has many other food options. Also can have nice stroll after your food. Overall nice place to chill and njoi food.

Very good food with great ambiance, the staff are so good on service and best of luck to you guys.. hats off to those chef's hardworking inside the kitchen..we just love  it so much and plan to come again..see you'll guys again..
Recommend their freshly made naan and roti , mutton briyani and delicious tandoori chicken. Very nice and accomodative service staff.
We had a great experience at Tandoor. Akhil and Preet did a fantastic job with the service. We were able to enjoy our time there. We highly recommend people to visit this place.
